title: Evolution and Creationism
body:
Now I'm not sure if this is a really good idea, what with the topic and all, but whatever... 

A lot of people seem to confuse Darwinists with Atheists. They're not interchangeable. Atheists do not believe that a transient deity can exist. 
Darwinists simply believe in the proposed theory of life known as evolution. 

Most Atheists will believe in Evolution because it is the most logical from a scientific standpoint. That being said, not ALL Evolutionists are Atheist. Some may be Agnostic or fully Theistic. 

Another thing I don't understand is why most religious groups have such a problem with evolution. Personally I believe is because it gives a completely alternate and opposing view of the beginning of life, which is backed by science and logic, and contradicts most Genesis stories. 

Any thoughts?
